templates.template:
<xf:textboxrow name="options[project_id]" value="{$profile.options.project_id}" required="true" label="{{ phrase('paysera_project_id') }}" hint="{{ phrase('required') }}">
<xf:explain> {{ phrase('paysera_project_id_explain') }} </xf:explain> </xf:textboxrow>
<xf:textboxrow name="options[project_password]" value="{$profile.options.project_password}" required="true" autosize="true" label="{{ phrase('paysera_project_password') }}" explain="{{ phrase('paysera_project_password_explain') }}" hint="{{ phrase('required') }}" />
<xf:checkboxrow> <xf:option name="options[test_payment]" selected="$profile.options.test_payment" label="{{ phrase('test_payment') }}" hint="{{ phrase('test_payment_hint') }}" /> </xf:checkboxrow>
<xf:hiddenval name="options[legacy]" value="{{ $profile.options.legacy ? 1 : 0 }}" />
